speaker: Diego
text: We’ll be fine, as long as the demo server stays stable during the presentation.
ipa: wil bi faɪn | æz lɔŋ æz ðə ˈdɛmoʊ ˈsɝvɚ steɪz ˈsteɪbəl ˈdjʊɹɪŋ ðə ˌpɹɛzənˈteɪʃən
stress: WE’LL be FINE | as LONG as the DEMO SERVER STAYS STABLE during the PRESENTATION
linking:
"demo server" → /ˈdɛmoʊ ˈsɝvɚ/ (oʊ + s linking)
"stays stable" → /steɪz ˈsteɪbəl/ (z + s linking)

speaker: Lena
text: Yeah. I already restarted the service in case something was still cached.
ipa: jæ | aɪ ɔlˈɹɛdi ˌɹiˈstɑɹtɪd ðə ˈsɝvɪs ɪn keɪs ˈsʌmθɪŋ wəz stɪl kæʃt
stress: YEAH | I ALREADY RESTARTED the SERVICE in CASE SOMETHING was STILL CACHED
linking:
"already restarted" → /ɔlˈɹɛdi ˌɹiˈstɑɹtɪd/ (i + r linking)
"service in" → /ˈsɝvɪs ɪn/ (s + i linking)

speaker: Diego
text: Good call. I wouldn’t rely on the Wi-Fi unless we have a backup hotspot ready.
ipa: ɡʊd kɔl | aɪ ˈwʊdənt ɹɪˈlaɪ ɑn ðə ˈwaɪfaɪ ənˈlɛs wi hæv ə ˈbækʌp ˈhɑtspɑt ˈɹɛdi
stress: GOOD CALL | I WOULDN’T RELY on the WI-FI UNLESS we HAVE a BACKUP HOTSPOT READY
linking:
"rely on" → /ɹɪˈlaɪ ɑn/ (y + o linking)
"backup hotspot" → /ˈbækʌp ˈhɑtspɑt/ (p + h linking)

speaker: Lena
text: Don’t worry — I brought one. And the frontend will look great provided that no one clears the CDN again.
ipa: doʊnt ˈwɝi — aɪ bɹɔt wʌn | ænd ðə ˈfɹʌntɛnd wɪl lʊk ɡɹeɪt pɹəˈvaɪdɪd ðæt noʊ wʌn klɪɹz ðə si di ɛn əˈɡɛn
stress: DON’T WORRY — I BROUGHT ONE | AND the FRONTEND will LOOK GREAT PROVIDED that NO ONE CLEARS the CDN AGAIN
linking:
"frontend will" → /ˈfɹʌntɛnd wɪl/ (d + w linking)
"clears the" → /klɪɹz ðə/ (z + th linking)

speaker: Diego
text: Haha, yeah. Even if something breaks, we can pivot and show the prototype instead.
ipa: hɑ hɑ jæ | ˈivən ɪf ˈsʌmθɪŋ bɹeɪks | wi kæn ˈpɪvət ænd ʃoʊ ðə ˈpɹoʊtəˌtaɪp ɪnˈstɛd
stress: HAHA, YEAH | EVEN IF SOMETHING BREAKS | we CAN PIVOT and SHOW the PROTOTYPE INSTEAD
linking:
"pivot and" → /ˈpɪvət ænd/ (t + a linking)
"show the" → /ʃoʊ ðə/ (w + th linking)

speaker: Lena
text: Exactly. As long as we stay calm, it’ll feel under control to them.
ipa: ɪɡˈzæktli | æz lɔŋ æz wi steɪ kɑm | ˈɪtəl fil ˈʌndɚ kənˈtɹoʊl tu ðɛm
stress: EXACTLY | AS LONG AS we STAY CALM | it’ll FEEL UNDER CONTROL to THEM
linking:
"stay calm" → /steɪ kɑm/ (y + c linking)
"feel under" → /fil ˈʌndɚ/ (l + u linking)

speaker: Diego
text: True. Also, I’ll explain the architecture in more detail in case they ask about scaling.
ipa: tɹu | ˈɔlsoʊ | aɪl ɪkˈspleɪn ði ˈɑɹkəˌtɛktʃɚ ɪn mɔɹ dɪˈteɪl ɪn keɪs ðeɪ æsk əˈbaʊt ˈskeɪlɪŋ
stress: TRUE | ALSO | I’LL EXPLAIN the ARCHITECTURE in MORE DETAIL in CASE they ASK about SCALING
linking:
"explain the" → /ɪkˈspleɪn ði/ (n + th linking)
"ask about" → /æsk əˈbaʊt/ (k + a linking)

speaker: Lena
text: Great. And the team will be joining remotely — unless something changes last minute.
ipa: ɡɹeɪt | ænd ðə tim wɪl bi ˈʤɔɪnɪŋ ɹɪˈmoʊtli — ənˈlɛs ˈsʌmθɪŋ ˈʧeɪnʤɪz læst ˈmɪnɪt
stress: GREAT | AND the TEAM will be JOINING REMOTELY — UNLESS SOMETHING CHANGES LAST MINUTE
linking:
"team will" → /tim wɪl/ (m + w linking)
"joining remotely" → /ˈʤɔɪnɪŋ ɹɪˈmoʊtli/ (ŋ + r linking)
